Name: borderline leprosy
Definition: A leprosy that results in small numerous red irregularly shaped plaques.

Name: tuberculoid leprosy
Definition: A leprosy that results in one erythematous large plaque with well-defined borders that are elevated and that slope down into an atrophic center.

Name: lepromatous leprosy
Definition: A leprosy that results in early cutaneous lesions which consist of pale macules that are small

Name: indeterminate leprosy
Definition: A leprosy that is an early form of the disease which causes one to a few hypopigmented or erythematous macules.

Name: obsolete aortic valve syphilitic endocarditis
Definition: A leprosy that is an early form of the disease which causes one to a few hypopigmented or erythematous macules.
